problems.title: 1 åˆ° n çš„æ•´æ•¸è¼¸å‡º
problems.description: è¼¸å…¥æ•´æ•¸ nï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ for è¿´åœˆè¼¸å‡º 1 åˆ° nã€‚

answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int n=sc.nextInt(); for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){ System.out.print(i + (i<n?" ":"")); } }}

problems.title: è¨ˆç®— 1 åˆ° n çš„ç¸½å’Œ
problems.description: è¼¸å…¥ nï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ for è¿´åœˆè¨ˆç®— 1 åˆ° n çš„ç¸½å’Œã€‚

answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt(),sum=0;for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)sum+=i;System.out.print(sum);} }

problems.title: while è¿´åœˆï¼šå€’æ•¸è¼¸å‡º
problems.description: è¼¸å…¥ nï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ while è¿´åœˆè¼¸å‡º n åˆ° 1ã€‚

answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();while(n>=1){System.out.print(n + (n>1?" ":""));n--;}} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();do{System.out.print(n);}while(false);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt(),sum=0;for(int i=2;i<=n;i+=2)sum+=i;System.out.print(sum);} }

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int[] x={sc.nextInt(),sc.nextInt(),sc.nextInt()};int s=0;for(int v:x)s+=v;System.out.print(s);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt(),p=1,i=1;while(i<=n){p*=i;i++;}System.out.print(p);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){for(int i=1;i<=5;i++){if(i==3)continue;System.out.print(i + (i<5?" ":""));}} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){for(int i=1;i<=10;i++){if(i==7)break;System.out.print(i + (i<6?" ":""));}} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();for(int i=0;i<n;i++)System.out.print("*");}}
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt(),s=0;for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)s+=i*i;System.out.print(s);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();for(int i=1;i<=n;i+=2)System.out.print(i + (i+2<=n?" ":""));}}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();for(int i=n;i>=1;i--){for(int j=1;j<=i;j++)System.out.print("*");System.out.println();}} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){for(int i=1;i<=9;i++){for(int j=1;j<=9;j++)System.out.print(i*j + (j<9?" ":""));System.out.println();}} }

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int[] x=new int[5];for(int i=0;i<5;i++)x[i]=sc.nextInt();int m=x[0];for(int v:x)if(v>m)m=v;System.out.print(m);} }

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){if(i%3==0)continue;System.out.print(i + (i<n?" ":""));}} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int sum=0,x;while(true){x=sc.nextInt();if(x==0)break;sum+=x;}System.out.print(sum);} }

problems.title: å·¢ç‹€è¿´åœˆï¼šçŸ©å½¢è¼¸å‡º
problems.description: è¼¸å…¥ r cï¼Œè¼¸å‡º r è¡Œ c åˆ—çš„ *ã€‚

answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int r=sc.nextInt(),c=sc.nextInt();for(int i=0;i<r;i++){for(int j=0;j<c;j++)System.out.print("*");System.out.println();}} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt(),sum=0,i=1;while(sum<n){sum+=i;i++;}System.out.print(sum);} }

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();long f=1;for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){f*=i;System.out.print(f + (i<n?" ":""));}} }

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();if(n<2){System.out.print("NO");return;}for(int i=2;i*i<=n;i++){if(n%i==0){System.out.print("NO");return;}}System.out.print("YES");}}

import java.util.*; public class Main{static boolean p(int n){if(n<2)return false;for(int i=2;i*i<=n;i++)if(n%i==0)return false;return true;} public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();boolean first=true;for(int i=2;i<=n;i++){if(p(i)){if(!first)System.out.print(" ");System.out.print(i);first=false;}} }}

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){for(int s=1;s<=n-i;s++)System.out.print(" ");for(int k=1;k<=2*i-1;k++)System.out.print("*");System.out.println();}} }

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();for(int i=n;i>=1;i--){for(int s=1;s<=n-i;s++)System.out.print(" ");for(int k=1;k<=2*i-1;k++)System.out.print("*");System.out.println();}} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();long f=1;for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)f*=i;System.out.print(f);} }

import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();boolean first=true;for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){if(i%2==0 || i%5==0)continue;if(!first)System.out.print(" ");System.out.print(i);first=false;}} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){outer:for(int i=1;i<=10;i++){for(int j=1;j<=10;j++){if(i*j>50){System.out.print(i+" "+j);break outer;}}}} }

problems.title: whileï¼šæ‰¾å‡ºç¬¬ä¸€å€‹å¹³æ–¹å¤§æ–¼ n çš„æ•¸
problems.description: è¼¸å…¥ nï¼Œæ‰¾å‡ºæœ€å° k ä½¿å¾— k*k > nã€‚

answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt(),k=1;while(k*k<=n)k++;System.out.print(k);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt(),r=0;while(n>0){r=r*10+n%10;n/=10;}System.out.print(r);} }

problems.title: åˆ¤æ–·å®Œå…¨å¹³æ–¹æ•¸
problems.description: è¼¸å…¥ nï¼Œè‹¥ n æ˜¯æŸæ•¸å­—çš„å¹³æ–¹è¼¸å‡º YESï¼Œå¦å‰‡ NOã€‚

answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{public static void main(String[]a){Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);int n=sc.nextInt();int k=(int)Math.sqrt(n);System.out.print(k*k==n?"YES":"NO");}}

import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[] args){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int n=sc.nextInt(); int f1=1,f2=1; if(n>=1) System.out.print(1); if(n>=2) System.out.print(",1"); for(int i=3;i<=n;i++){ int f3=f1+f2; System.out.print(","+f3); f1=f2; f2=f3; } } }
